p:
Throughout the late-20th and early-21st centuries, target dates for the elimination of human-dog-mediated rabies were set by the WHO, the Pan American Health Organization, and other international governmental and non-governmental organizations for Africa, Asia, and Latin America ( 65â€“ 68 http://www.paho.org/hq/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=11243%3Astep-up-action-toward-rabieselimination&Itemid=1926&lang=en). These recent end dates were endorsed by the World Health Assembly in May 2013
69 .
